column6: How many people live in your household (including yourself)?
column7: What is your primary mode of transportation?
column8: Which bus line(s) do you use most often in Almere?
column9: What time do you usually leave for work/school?
column10: How long is your one-way commute?
column11: How many days per week do you commute?
column12: How crowded is your usual bus during peak hours?
column13: What issues frustrate you most about Almere Bus line?
column14: Do you currently use any app to check bus schedules ?
column15: Taking public transport is convenient for me.
column16: Most people I know use public transport or recommend it.
column17: I can easily change my travel time if I want to avoid a crowd.
column18: I would change my departure time if I knew my usual bus was full.
column19: I care about reducing traffic congestion and pollution.
column20: I feel in control of when and how I travel during the week.
column21: I rarely think about how crowded the bus will be when planning my trip.
column22: Even if a bus is full, it doesn't affect my travel choices.
column23: If your usual bus is 90% full when it arrives, what would you most likely do?
column24: Would you be open to using an app that gives personal travel advice based on real-time crowd levels?
column25: Why do you prefer (or not prefer) avoiding crowded buses?
column26: Does this current app show the crowd level in the buses
column27: Would you be willing to use an app that not only shows how full a bus is likely to be, but also provides feedback on your travel habits based on a brief conversation with a chatbot
column28: Would you be open to having a short 3–5 step conversation with a chatbot about your journey, instead of using traditional origin–destination travel apps, in order to receive personalized travel suggestions tailored to your specific trip

column25: Crowded buses are uncomfortable
I usually work with time and if I need to wait for the next bus, I w9uld be late for my arrival time or meetings.
I avoid it because of congestion, but sometimes I have no choice
I don’t avoid it because I still want to get to my destination at my preferred time
Because i care more about coming on time than being in a crowdy buss.
I do not avoid crowded buses because of the associated wait time and arrival time
It’s more convenient
I would prefer not to use a crowded bus if i am traveling long distance
No preference
It’s not a preference for me. I can always stand in my ride.
Crowding is not the most important factor for me when deciding what/when to take public transport

column24: No, because both Google and NS planner already do this and it doesn’t change my decision to travel. I don’t even notice it because I have to go when I have to go. People deciding to board same time as me doesn’t change anything
column25: Because the important of my destination(work) is the decider of when I arrive, not my mode of transportation
Comfort is important when commuting via bus so crowded buses are a no
For convenience I prefer when it’s not crowded as I just dislike squashing myself between people
Mostly because I have planned by that time. I can’t avoid crowded bus. Also M6 comes every 10mins during the week
